name: AIA_RULE_Operation_CompareExpressions
description: Expression rule that performs a comparison operation between two values calculated using Josson Expressions
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!parameters: ri!parameters,
  local!context: ri!parameters.context,
  local!operator: local!context.ruleOperator,
  local!lhs: rule!AIA_ExtractJsonExpression(
    map: ri!parameters.instanceMap,
    expression: local!context.lhs
  ),
  local!rhs: rule!AIA_ExtractJsonExpression(
    map: ri!parameters.instanceMap,
    expression: local!context.rhs
  ),
  local!todos: rule!SHRD_TODO(
    what: "
- Handle tables
- Handle different data types
"
  ),
  rule!AIA_RULE_DynamicBooleanOperation(
    valueOne: local!lhs,
    operator: local!operator,
    valueTwo: local!rhs
  )
)
